title: Starry Night
artist_desc: A swirling night sky over a quiet town.
reviewer_desc: A masterpiece of post-impressionism, capturing emotion through color.
location: Museum of Modern Art, New York

title: Water Lilies
artist_desc: My attempt to capture the play of light on water.
reviewer_desc: Lyrical and immersive, Monet’s lilies usher in the modern era.
